t: Amazon Scout - Wikipedia
s: April 22, 2025 - Amazon Scout was a six-wheeled delivery robot used to deliver packages for multinational company Amazon. Amazon Scout originally debuted on January 23, 2019, delivering packages to Amazon customers in Snohomish County, Washington. Amazon scouts move on sidewalks, at a walking pace.
